sentences.en: " To - morrow, " he said at parting, a gayety of manner adding wonderfully to his brave demeanour.
sentences.cn: “ 明天见, " 分手时他说道.他的欢乐的情绪使他一往无前的气概更加潇洒.

sentences.en: As soon as she woke up her demeanour had changed.
sentences.cn: 她一睡醒,那动作便截然不同.

sentences.en: Carrie looked at him, and gathered from his whole demeanour what it meant.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉望着他, 从他整个的神态上看出了这件事的意义所在.

sentences.en: From his general demeanour I didn't get the impression that he was being ironical.
sentences.cn: 从他整体的行为来看，我不觉得他是在讲反话。

sentences.en: He maintained a professional demeanour throughout.
sentences.cn: 他始终保持着专业人才的风度。

sentences.en: He resolved upon a terrible demeanour in the presence of the dairy girl.
sentences.cn: 他决定当着这牛乳场姑娘的面,装出恶劣透顶的态度.

sentences.en: He was a brotherly sort of creature in his demeanour.
He was erect in attitude , and quiet in demeanour.

sentences.cn: 他少言寡语、含蓄的举止

sentences.en: Minnie was truly distressed at this, but maintained a kindly demeanour.
sentences.cn: 敏妮为这事很忧愁, 不过态度一直很温和.

sentences.en: That lady, prudent and reserved , maintained an irreproachedable demeanour.
sentences.cn: 这位女士, 持重,谨慎, 保守了无可非议的品行.

sentences.en: The demeanour of the black - uniformed men suddenly became more subdued.
sentences.cn: 穿黑制服的汉子们的态度马上安静下来.

sentences.en: The man was polite and his general demeanour had the air of a clergyman.
sentences.cn: 那男人彬彬有礼,一举一动都有教士的风度.

sentences.en: The sorrowful demeanour , the tremolo music, the long, explanatory , cumulative addresses, all were there.
sentences.cn: 悲哀痛苦的姿势, 如泣如诉的音乐, 长长的说明性道白使情节层层推进, 通俗剧的成份一样也没少.

sentences.en: This demeanour is usually indicative of pain.
sentences.cn: 这种举动往往表明疼痛.

sentences.en: When Hanson came home he wore the same inscrutable demeanour.
sentences.cn: 汉生回到家里,脸上仍是一副莫测高深的表情.

trans.tran_en: the way someone behaves, dresses, speaks etc that shows what their character is like
